name: Tzatziki
description: I like tzatziki alone or spread on pita, alongside fish or with an assortment of vegetables. Cucumber makes it light and refreshing, while garlic adds bite and olive oil imparts just a hint of fruity richness.
recipeIngredient: 1 large cucumber, peeled, seeded, and grated

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium bowl, whisk together yogurt, cucumber, and garlic.
Stir in olive oil and red wine vinegar until fully incorporated. Season with salt to taste.
